mapper.select: SELECT dishTag.`id` AS id, dishTag.`tag_id` AS tagId, dishTag.`dish_id` AS dishId, dish.`dish_number` AS dishNumber, dish.`assistant_code` AS dishAssistantCode, dish.`name` AS dishName, unit.`name` AS dishUnitName, dish.`price` AS dishPrice, dish.`sale_price` AS dishSalePrice, dish.`status` AS dishStatus, dish.`category_id` AS dishCategoryId, dish.`discount` AS dishDiscount FROM `t_dish_tag` dishTag LEFT JOIN `t_dish` dish ON dishTag.`dish_id` = dish.`id` LEFT JOIN `t_unit` unit ON dish.`unit_id` = unit.`id` WHERE dishTag.`tag_id` = #{tagId}
